title: Login page not loading
description: User reports that the login page stays blank after clicking the login button.

title: Password reset email not received
description: Customer did not receive the password reset email after multiple attempts.

title: Dashboard slow performance
description: Dashboard takes more than 20 seconds to load data.

title: Profile image upload failed
description: System throws an error when uploading a JPG profile image.

title: Payment confirmation missing
description: Payment completed but confirmation message not shown.

title: Unable to update user settings
description: Changes in user settings are not being saved.

title: Notification emails delayed
description: Email notifications are delivered after several hours.

title: Mobile view layout broken
description: UI elements overlap on small screen devices.

title: Search feature not returning results
description: Search returns empty results even for valid keywords.

title: Error 500 on reports page
description: Server error appears when opening the reports section.

title: Export to PDF not working
description: PDF export generates a corrupted file.

title: Session timeout too short
description: Users are logged out after only a few minutes of inactivity.
